keyPolicies.policyDescription: A vote for Coalville, Whitwick & Ellistown is a vote to revitalise the area's local economy, including better transport plans.
Focus on reducing hospital waiting times and opposing any downgrading of local hospitals.

issues.economy: The local economy: A vote here for Paul Reynolds is a vote to get the plans going!
issues.health: Local health services: Paul has a plan to cut hospital waiting times and opposing the down grading of local hospitals.

housing.content: Local Lib Dem and Parliamentary Candidate, Prof Paul Ray Reynolds, is campaigning to save Coalville, Whitwick & Ellistown and ensure housing planning is sensible.

images.caption: Paul Reynolds pictured with constituents discussing local issues.
